traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: Tashlyn can reroll a saving throw that she fails. She must use the new roll.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Tashlyn can regain 20 hit points.

traits.name: Extra Damage
entries: Tashlyn deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to every hit if she has more than half her hit points remaining.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Tashlyn makes three attacks with her greatsword or her shortbow.

actions.name: Greatsword
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
